bibl.title: The Significance of the Papyri for Determining the Nature of the New Testament Text in the Second Century: A Dynamic View of Textual Transmission.
Gospel Traditions in the Second Century: Origins, Recensions, Text, and Transmission
bibl.author: Epp, Eldon Jay

bibl.seg: Epp Eldon Jay, The Significance of the Papyri for Determining the Nature of the New Testament Text in the Second Century: A Dynamic View of Textual Transmission.

William L. Petersen (Ed.), Gospel Traditions in the Second Century: Origins, Recensions, Text, and Transmission = Christianity and Judaism in Antiquity. 3 (Notre-Dame, Indiana, 1989) pp. 1-32, 1 carte.
